items.sentence: I can\'t explain the difference between those two.
I don\'t know whether I should believe Tom or not.
The police officer asked Tom to empty his pockets.
There are a lot of gifts under the Christmas tree.
Can you give me a ride to the office on Wednesday?
Can you remember how slow the Internet used to be?
Can you remember the first time we met each other?
Can you touch your toes without bending your legs?
You\'re getting more and more beautiful every day.
You\'re not going to make me drink alone, are you?
